thread.title: Free $25 candle lantern, BOGO holiday sale at Hallmark Gold Crown
thread.title_full: Free $25 candle lantern, BOGO holiday sale at Hallmark Gold Crown

author: Doreen Christensen
title: Free $25 candle lantern, BOGO holiday sale at Hallmark Gold Crown
text:
Free $25 candle lantern, BOGO holiday sale at Hallmark Gold Crown 2-for-1 greeting cards, wrapping paper at Hallmark Holiday Stock-Up Sale. Doreen Christensen Sun Sentinel BOGO Holiday Sale at Hallmark through Oct. 25 
Now, don't get your stockings in a wad as I suggest you purchase Christmas stuff in October, but... 
There is this awesome yearly Pre-Season Holiday Stock-Up Sale at Hallmark Gold Crown Stores offering 2-for-1 deals on those adorable Hallmark gift tags and wrap, holiday and greeting cards, candles and other nifty Yuletide goodies. 
I love Hallmark's high-quality stuff, but not the high price, so I'm hitting the sale. You can shop online and get free shipping to store. 
However, shop in stores and you'll get a free $24.99 ceramic lantern with any $50 purchase. The white lattice lantern would make nice gift for someone on your holiday list. 
Click here for the deal. The sale, online and in stores, ends Oct. 25. 
Like Doreen's Deals on Facebook ; follow Doreen Christensen on Twitter@PrettyGoodIdeas and sign up for Deals text alerts .
